Hover Craft

test ver 0.2

Hovering height, max-force and damping ratio is control by right click menu, all engines share same settings.

Consume ElectricCharge and efficiency could be modified by CFG file.

This engine will cast a ray to its pointing direction to calculate distance and apply force.

Bug reports and suggestions are welcome.

Download
